name: Inside Deathco
description:
This short story/game is a documentary about a man named Marcus. He was recently fired form his job at Deathco, a company that performs death services. Once the people of the world stopped dying, the companies were created to fill the place of natural death.

Controls:Mouse to click buttons and advance dialogue

This game was made in 2 days for the FlameGames Jam.

Voice Acting by Jakob D. and John Cavatelli
